home.pageDescription: A little bit about me and my work
home.cub3dQuote: This project, which I completed in 2022, is a ray-casting engine built entirely in C.
home.transcendenceQuote: Final project for the 42 core curriculum. Carried out in groups, this is a web application for an online pong game.
home.flutterMobileAppQuote: This project is a mobile application developed with Flutter for a window cleaning company. It is an internal application that communicates with the CRM, allowing sales representatives to generate contracts and organize their schedules. It also enables technical staff to manage on-site interventions for clients.
home.CRMWebAppQuote: This project is a web application developed with Spring Boot (Java) and Vue.js. It is a complete rebuild of an existing application. It allows the management of prospects, clients, contracts, interventions, invoices, salaries, and more. It also includes an algorithm aimed at optimizing technicians' travel routes. The application is used by the entire company.
